alert.note: Alert for Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 22 at 3:08PM MST until December 25 at 5:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. Peak winds will occur Friday afternoon. * WHERE...Mostly over the upper slopes and ridges of the Black Range and the downwind eastern slopes.. * WHEN...From Friday morning through late Friday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong westerly winds could topple trees, cause power interruptions, and blow about loose outdoor objects, even causing damage to light structures..
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
